subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Bowl Championship Series standings will be released Sunday for the first time this season, reviving the annual debate about the system for determining a national champion. The standings will determine who plays for the B.C.S. national championship and which teams are eligible for the other B.C.S. games.
